price: 34. Шак-шубҳасиз, Биз фосиқ-итоатсиз бўлганлари учун бу қишлоқ аҳли устига осмондан азоб-тош ёғдирувчидирмиз.
arabic: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā munzilūna ʿalā ahli hādhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
